Title: Convert Critical Fixes into 1-Week Sprint
Labels: product,ux,seo

Summary:
Turn the "Critical Fixes" list in `SITE_OVERHAUL_PLAN.md` into a 1-week sprint board and create issues/cards for each fix (remove duplicate hero image, create course page, fix nav links).

Checklist:
- [ ] Create sprint board in project tracker (GitHub Projects / Trello)
- [ ] Create issue for removing duplicate hero image
- [ ] Create issue for dedicated course product page (`/course/thyroid-health-mastery`)
- [ ] Create issue for auditing and fixing navigation links
